trans-unit.target: Chi rij le Raqanib’al ri Cholq’ij

trans-unit.source: Using this template, you can make an A5-size 12 month calendar, with a picture and quotation on the top page, and days on the bottom. The calendar will use the names of months and days in your language.
trans-unit.target: Ruk’ we raqanib’al ri', katkowinik kab’an jun cholq’ij rech kab’lajuj ik’ ruk' unimal A5, ruk’ jun wachib’al xuquje’ jun chomab’al pa uwi' chi jujunal ri uxaq wuj xuquje’ ri q’ij rech ri ik’ chi uxe’. Ri cholq’ij kuya'o kukoj ri b’i’aj rech taq ri ik’ xuquje’ ri q’ij rech ri atzijob’al.

trans-unit.source: Currently, you cannot make a "shell" for other languages to use.
trans-unit.target: Chanim ri’, man kuya taj kab’an jun “cholq'ij wokotal chik” rech kokisax pa jule' taq tzijob’al chik.

trans-unit.source: Thanks to Bruce Cox (SIL Cameroon) for getting this template started.
trans-unit.target: Maltyox chech Bruce Cox (SIL Camerún) rumal umajik ub’anik we raqanib’al ri'.
